# Linear mixed model analysis
The data is not normally distributed (log normal distribution). 

SEE: https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/181034/post-hoc-test-of-interaction-factor-in-binomial-glmm-with-proportions
https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/lsmeans/vignettes/using-lsmeans.pdf

## Distribution
```{r}
require(car)
require(MASS)
lmr_model <- lmer(conc_log ~ feature * depth * stage + (1 | location) + (1 | feature : station), data=data.conc.labrid, REML=TRUE)
summary(lmr_model)
```

Anova on the model
```{r}
Anova(lmr_model)
```

Interaction diagram
```{r}
lsmip(lmr_model, stage ~ depth | feature)
```

Post-hoc tests
```{r}
lsmeans(lmr_model, ~ feature*stage)
summary(pairs(lsmeans(lmr_model, ~ feature*stage)), type = "response")
```
